title: Virat Kohli:Virat Kohli's Cover Drive Is A Treat To Watch And Here's The Science Behind Producing Such An Artistic Shot
text:
Over the years if there is one shot that we have enjoyed Virat

Cricinfo

Kohli play is the cover drive. It is pretty much a given when he connects that the ball will find the gap. The sheer artistry is the shot is what leaves people mesmerised. You want to watch it again and again. One really never gets tired of it.

But Kohli is no supernatural being, he is but a human, an extraordinary one of course but a human nonetheless. So when he produces such a quality stroke, obviously there is some science behind it. There is a lot he needs to work on in order to get it perfectly right. Even the slightest mistake can result in an edge to the keeper or the slips or even spooning it to cover.

So how does he do it? What is the science behind this art? Well it involves keeping the head, feet and bat in the right position. Hand-eye coordination and timing are crucial. All in all Kohli's mind and body are absorbed when he goes through the motion of hitting the ball and maintaining the best follow through pose. But enough talk, see for yourself and learn:

It is one of the best shots to watch in the modern age. No wonder that a high percentage of his runs have come in the cover region. After all, he remains one of the best batsmen in the world today and for good reason.
